entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
